page.title: 19SPORTS
page.content:
The large areas of farm and woodland are ideal for the pursuit of{country {sports}which include{mink and fox {hunting, partridge and pheasant {shooting, and trout fishing. Whitfield and Kenchurch estates have large syndicate shoots over much of the area and work in harmony with local farmers, many of whom are personally involved in the organisation of the shoots. The {gamekeepers}are useful too, as they control the vermin which helps to protect crops and livestock.
Another physical activity is{football. A local team plays matches during the winter on a pitch, normally inhabited by a flock of sheep, at Howton Farm. Fortunately the sheep don't seem to mind sharing their grazing each Sunday afternoon !
